                       , o_rt_lre   OUT lm_load_rules%ROWTYPE )

                           , o_rt_lre   OUT lm_load_rules%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN

RETURN NUMBER

RETURN BOOLEAN

function lre_select_row( i_lre_id   in  lm_load_rules.id%type
                       , o_rt_lre   out lm_load_rules%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lre_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lre ( i_lre_id   in  lm_load_rules.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_load_rules lre
            where lre.id = i_lre_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_lre( i_lre_id => i_lre_id );
         fetch c_lre into o_rt_lre;
         l_found := c_lre%found;
         close c_lre;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_lre%isopen
         then
            close c_lre;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lre_select_row;

                           , o_rt_lre   out lm_load_rules%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lre_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_lre ( i_lre_id   in  lm_load_rules.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_load_rules lre
            where lre.id = i_lre_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_lre( i_lre_id => i_lre_id );
   fetch c_lre into o_rt_lre;
   l_found := c_lre%found;
   close c_lre;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_lre%isopen
      then
         close c_lre;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end lre_select_row_upd;

procedure lre_lock_row( i_lre_id   in  lm_load_rules.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lre_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_lre ( i_lre_id   in  lm_load_rules.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_load_rules lre
              where lre.id = i_lre_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_lre_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                lre_lock_row_nowait( i_lre_id => i_lre_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_lre( i_lre_id => i_lre_id );
                  close c_lre;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_lre%isopen
         then
            close c_lre;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lre_lock_row;

procedure lre_lock_row_nowait( i_lre_id   in  lm_load_rules.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lre_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lre ( i_lre_id   in  lm_load_rules.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_load_rules lre
               where lre.id = i_lre_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_lre_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_lre( i_lre_id => i_lre_id );

            close c_lre;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_lre%isopen
        then
           close c_lre;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_lre_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lre_lock_row_nowait;

procedure lre_insert_row ( io_rt_lre  in out lm_load_rules%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lre_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_load_rules( id
                                , lgp_id
                                , lower_load_value
                                , recirculation_count
                                , description )
              values ( io_rt_lre.id
                     , io_rt_lre.lgp_id
                     , io_rt_lre.lower_load_value
                     , io_rt_lre.recirculation_count
                     , io_rt_lre.description )
           returning id
                   , lgp_id
                   , lower_load_value
                   , recirculation_count
                   , description
                into io_rt_lre.id
                   , io_rt_lre.lgp_id
                   , io_rt_lre.lower_load_value
                   , io_rt_lre.recirculation_count
                   , io_rt_lre.description;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_lre.id||'"'
                                                             ||', LGP_ID = "'||io_rt_lre.lgp_id||'"'
                                                             ||', LOWER_LOAD_VALUE = "'||io_rt_lre.lower_load_value||'"'
                                                             ||', RECIRCULATION_COUNT = "'||io_rt_lre.recirculation_count||'"'
                                                             ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_lre.description||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lre_insert_row;

function lre_perform_update( i_lre_id   in     lm_load_rules.id%type
                           , io_rt_lre  in out lm_load_rules%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lre_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_load_rules
            set id = io_rt_lre.id
              , lgp_id = io_rt_lre.lgp_id
              , lower_load_value = io_rt_lre.lower_load_value
              , recirculation_count = io_rt_lre.recirculation_count
              , description = io_rt_lre.description
          where id = i_lre_id
      returning id
              , lgp_id
              , lower_load_value
              , recirculation_count
              , description
           into io_rt_lre.id
              , io_rt_lre.lgp_id
              , io_rt_lre.lower_load_value
              , io_rt_lre.recirculation_count
              , io_rt_lre.description;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_lre.id||'"'
                                                             ||', LGP_ID = "'||io_rt_lre.lgp_id||'"'
                                                             ||', LOWER_LOAD_VALUE = "'||io_rt_lre.lower_load_value||'"'
                                                             ||', RECIRCULATION_COUNT = "'||io_rt_lre.recirculation_count||'"'
                                                             ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_lre.description||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lre_perform_update;

function lre_perform_delete( i_lre_id   in  lm_load_rules.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lre_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_load_rules
          where id = i_lre_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_lre_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lre_perform_delete;

function lre_update_row( i_lre_id   in     lm_load_rules.id%type
                       , io_rt_lre  in out lm_load_rules%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lre_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         lre_lock_row( i_lre_id   =>  i_lre_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            lre_perform_update( i_lre_id   =>  i_lre_id
                              , io_rt_lre  => io_rt_lre );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_lre.id||'"'
                                                          ||', LGP_ID = "'||io_rt_lre.lgp_id||'"'
                                                          ||', LOWER_LOAD_VALUE = "'||io_rt_lre.lower_load_value||'"'
                                                          ||', RECIRCULATION_COUNT = "'||io_rt_lre.recirculation_count||'"'
                                                          ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_lre.description||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end lre_update_row;

function lre_delete_row( i_lre_id   in  lm_load_rules.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lre_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         lre_lock_row( i_lre_id   =>  i_lre_id );

         
         l_deleted := lre_perform_delete( i_lre_id   =>  i_lre_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_lre_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lre_delete_row;


end lm_lre_tapi_pck;
